question.title: Consecutive Transactions with Increasing Amounts
mysqlSchemas: Create table If Not Exists Transactions (transaction_id int, customer_id int, transaction_date date, amount int)
insert into Transactions (transaction_id, customer_id, transaction_date, amount) values ('1', '101', '2023-05-01', '100')
